title: News View :: The World On Arirang
text: The biggest fireworks festival in Seoul is being held at Hangang Yeouido Park.The 2019 Seoul International Fireworks Festival started an hour ago with around 1 million citizens and tourists gathered for the event.As a result, traffic is being restricted on roads near the area until 9:30 PM.The section from the southern end of Mapo Bridge to the 63 Square is completely closed off, while restrictions on Olympic Highway and Nodeul-gil will depend on conditions at the festival site.Also, the parking lot in Hangang Yeouido Park is temporarily closed until 11 PM tonight.
description: 한국을 대표하는 글로벌 방송! The World On Arirang!
